column5: I was saddened to hear of his passing, Stuart Mclean  http://www.thespec.com/news-story/7142563-stuart-mclean-host-of-cbc-radio-s-vinyl-cafe-has-died/
His stories are a great way to eat up a long drive for fishing or hunting.
His stories are a great way to eat up a long drive for fishing or hunting.  Yup. The drives home sundays listening to CBC radio.
I have a bunch of the podcasts downloaded as well.
When we were in the back woods and could only get CBC Canada we saved the batteries to listen to his show.
Buddy of mine just told me this at work tonight....The Vinyl Cafe, I could listen to this guy read letters and tell stories all day.
I was saddened to hear of his passing, Stuart Mclean  http://www.thespec.com/news-story/7142563-stuart-mclean-host-of-cbc-radio-s-vinyl-cafe-has-died/  So was I. A truly gifted story teller!
Hit me like a kick in the gut. I thought he was going to beat it.
